title: kailAsa nAthEna
sahitya:
kailAsa nAthEna samrakSitOham kaivalya prada nipuNatarENa shrI


anupallavi

 kailAsa giri vihArENa shaila rAjAtmajA mOhAkArENa


caraNam   sadgati dAyakAmbhOja caraNEna cAru sharashcandra kalAdharaNEna sadguruguha 
sannuta padEna satya jnAnAnandEna sanakAdi samshaya haraNEna cidAnanda hrdaya sthitEna
